description: Workspace auto-indexing COMPLETE: Miller now automatically indexes workspace on startup (adapted from Julie's pattern). Removed index_file MCP tool, added WorkspaceScanner with incremental change detection (hash-based), .gitignore support (pathspec library), file walking with language filtering. Server startup: check if indexing needed → run in background → ready for search. All tests updated and passing. Architecture: startup_indexing() → scanner.check_if_indexing_needed() → scanner.index_workspace() → stores in SQLite + LanceDB. Ready for end-to-end testing.
